title: Stuffed globe artichokes
ingredients: ['6 whole globe artichokes', '3 slices ciabatta, diced', '1 clove garlic, minced', 'handful chopped fresh parsley', '50g (2 oz) grated Pecorino cheese', '1/2 teaspoon dried oregano', '5 tablespoons olive oil, divided', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
